WRITING.TITLE: F/20/5 #8217;9 #8221; [254lbs gt; 211lbs = 44lbs] (3 months) I #8217;ve always been the heavy girl and I decided that needs to change. With a new lifestyle and positive thoughts, I hope to be in a much better physical and mental state as I reach my goals. I #8217;m not close yet, however everyday counts.

WRITING.TEXT: Thanks! Trying to more and more lol
Abs and butt workout (with weights) everyday and a much better diet! Cut out soda, bread, etc
Pants suck!! Even still I have a hard time finding good jeans. You #8217;ve got this, you #8217;ll get there

Most helpful would be drinking more water and eating better if I #8217;m honest. I used to have the hardest time getting through my water but I #8217;ve gotten it to a gallon a day. As soon as I stopped eating poorly I felt a bit fresher and could see the results. Hardest would absolutely be the food, though. I #8217;m a foodie type of gal and can go for pizza and brownies any day at anytime but I realized that if I want to reach my goals, I have to cut back a bit. I #8217;ve started experimenting with recipes and ingredients to make my faves, but healthier.
Thank you! I work abs and butt everyday with weights and drink tons of water. I try and focus on those areas most as that #8217;s where I wanted the most improvement!
For butt, weighted squats, donkey kicks with resistance bands, step ups, and weighted hip raises are just a few faves. For abs I do jackknife sit ups, flutter kicks, planks, etc!
You look like a new person, too! Good job #9786; #65039;

WRITING.TITLE: F/20/5 #8217;9 #8221; [254 lbs gt; 193 lbs = 61 lbs] (4 months) FINALLY BELOW 200 LBS! I posted about a month ago and was about 211 and I am finally here! WRITING.TEXT: It #8217;s all in the butt and thighs lol, thank you! I have been doing the Keto diet and focus training on my tum as well as my bottom!
I burn fat really quickly, always have. The biggest thing that helped me see a difference was diet! I #8217;ve been doing Keto for the entire time and it really is a fat killer!
Thank you so much!
Keto diet and plenty of exercise!
